subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart broke through for his first victory of the season, holding off Matt Kenseth on several late-race restarts Sunday to win the Nascar Nextel Cup Series race at Chicagoland Speedway.
snippet: Tony Stewart broke through for his first victory of the season, holding off Matt Kenseth on several late-race restarts Sunday to win the Nascar Nextel Cup Series race at Chicagoland Speedway.
